DataAssessmentValueMetric.name: DataAssessmentValueMetric
DataAssessmentValueMetric.description: Summarizes the number of fields matched for your account records with Data.com account records.

DataAssessmentFieldMetricId.description: A unique number that identifies the parent DataAssessementFieldMetric record.

FieldValue.description: The value in the matched field.

Name.description: An optional field used to name your record.

ValueCount.description: The number of times this value appears in this field.
